mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `gloria_services`.`rt_device` ( `rt` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `did` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(40) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rt`,`did`,`name`) USING BTREE, KEY `device` (`did`), CONSTRAINT `device` FOREIGN KEY (`did`) REFERENCES `gloria_services`.`device` (`did`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `rt` FOREIGN KEY (`rt`) REFERENCES `gloria_services`.`rt` (`name`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
